TextLibrary.Text: Welcome to Skullguard, mortals. Do you recognize me, half-breed?
Welcome to Skullguard, mortals. Do you recognize me, half-breed?
Welcome to Skullguard, mortals. Do you recognize me, half-breed?
Welcome to Skullguard, mortals. Do you recognize me, half-breed?
You! You are the creature who slew Liandra, my betrothed!
You! You are the creature who slew Liandra, my betrothed!
You! You are the creature who slew Liandra, my betrothed!
You! You are the creature who slew Liandra, my betrothed!
The one and only. It was so sad that you could not join her. You ran away like a frightened child if I remember correctly...
The one and only. It was so sad that you could not join her. You ran away like a frightened child if I remember correctly...
The one and only. It was so sad that you could not join her. You ran away like a frightened child if I remember correctly...
The one and only. It was so sad that you could not join her. You ran away like a frightened child if I remember correctly...
No! You will pay dearly for all that you have done!
No! You will pay dearly for all that you have done!
No! You will pay dearly for all that you have done!
No! You will pay dearly for all that you have done!
